<gallery>
File:Herpes LISA.jpeg|Genital herpes: painful postvesicular millimetric lesions with an inflammatory border of the glans.
</gallery>

question.question: What is the primary characteristic of genital herpes as shown in the photograph?
question.option_c: Painful, postvesicular millimetric lesions with an inflammatory border
question.option_d: Red, itchy rash without any vesicular lesions
